title: How I would make Google Stadia even better for the future
content:
Contrary to those shouting loudly on the internet, Google Stadia isn’t dead. And as I’ve written previously, it’s really rather good. description: Google Stadia is modeled like a traditional console, but maybe it should ditch this and consider a subscription-only future?
